content:
Two men decided to go to Romania without assistance and almost froze.

About thisShe reported March 12State Border Service of Ukraine.

Men planned the route for online cards in advance, but for some reason, they did not care for equipment, warm clothes and food.

After two days, border guards were stopped in the mountains, exhausted and frozen. Romania remained another one and a half kilometers.

The violators were brought to administrative liability, the case is sent to court.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat detained the ladder in Odesa region.
title: In Transcarpathia, border guards saved budget evies
description: This was reported on March 12 by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Men in advance ...
author: Army Inform
